stories.summary_es: Es esencial comunicar los desaf√≠os del cambio clim√°tico de manera equilibrada. Los expertos advierten que el exceso de pesimismo puede ser contraproducente para motivar la acci√≥n ambiental.
stories.body_es: La comunicaci√≥n del cambio clim√°tico presenta un dilema complejo para cient√≠ficos y periodistas. stories.body_en: Climate change communication presents a complex dilemma for scientists and journalists. While it is necessary to report on real risks, it is essential to avoid alarmism that paralyzes society. Although data on global warming is concerning, how it is presented determines public response. Experts suggest that we should emphasize both problems and viable solutions. Research indicates that when people perceive only imminent catastrophes, they tend to experience severe climate anxiety. For environmental action to be effective, citizens must feel empowered and capable of contributing. Some activists propose a more nuanced approach that acknowledges challenges without denying opportunities for positive change. Environmental success stories, though less prominent, demonstrate that transition is possible. Responsible communication requires balance: being honest about problems without generating hopelessness that inhibits citizen participation.
